short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Counts squares for Game of Amazons on littlegolem.net and allows for making exploratory moves.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Small extension for players of Game of Amazons on littlegolem.net. This extension counts squares owned by black & white as well as dead & neutral ones. In addition it also allows you to make & undo exploratory moves. 

Originally I wrote this just for myself in an afternoon to learn about & play with Chrome Extensions. Full source is at https://github.com/KjellSchubert/GameOfAmazonsLittlegolem.

Known issues: after clicking 'start making exploratory moves' you can can click any queen to move it, so in theory you can move two black queens in a row. Also: I wouldn't be surprised if the extension stopped working some day after littlegolem.net deploys an updated web application.
